short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens multiple Tabs to take some notes or copy your clipboard inside, simple and easy to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Notepad saves any plain text quickly and fast with no frills. Just insert your text manually or from your clipboard and here you go. 

- No unneeded stuff
- Saves up to 4 Tabs
- Fast and plain
- Nice dark theme
- converts your html text to plain
